milestones.description: Ranasinghe has broken the record for most ducks (2) in ODIs for SL, going past Ajit de Silva's 1
Wettimuny's 86 is the highest individual score in ODIs (for SL), surpassing Wettimuny's 67
This is the highest match aggregate (427) involving teams England & Sri Lanka in ODIs
Warnapura has broken the record for most catches (4) in ODIs for SL, going past Tennekoon's 3
Mahes Goonatilleke has broken the record for most dismissals (2) in ODIs for SL, going past Jayasinghe's 1
Mahes Goonatilleke has broken the record for most dismissals in an innings (2) in ODIs for SL, going past Jayasinghe's 1
de Silva has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (7) for SL, going past Warnapura
Ranatunga and Wettimuny's 87-run partnership is SL's highest for the 4th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 30 between Tennekoon and Duleep Mendis
de Mel and Wettimuny's 28-run partnership is SL's highest for the 7th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 15 between de Silva and Ranasinghe
de Silva and Wettimuny's 29-run partnership is SL's highest for the 8th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 23 between Mevan Pieris and de Silva

stories.title: The birth of a nation
stories.seoTitle: Rewind: Sri Lanka's first Test in 1982
stories.summary: We look back to the day Sri Lanka became the eighth country to play Test cricket

image.caption: Bandula Warnapura and Keith Fletcher go out to toss
image.longCaption: Bandula Warnapura and Keith Fletcher go out to toss, Sri Lanka v England, Inaugural Test, Colombo, February 17, 1982

stories.title: SRI LANKA v ENGLAND 1981-82
stories.subTitle: Second One-day International
stories.summary: Another capacity crowd of 22,000 saw their side avenge the previous day's defeat when England, needing 14 off the last two overs, lost four of their remaining five wickets to run-outs and the last to a skied catch
